price: Lakini wakiacha basi Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye kusamehe Mwenye kurehemu.
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
footnotes: Wakirejea wakaacha ukafiri, wakafuata Uislamu basi Uislamu humuitikia anaye uelekea. Na Mwenyezi Mungu atawasamehe ule ukafiri wao wa zamani kwa fadhila yake na rehema yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
